actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the penalty imposed on wage income earned by individuals who have attained retirement age.
short_title: Fair Tax Relief for Working Older Americans
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Fair Tax Relief for Working Older Americans - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise excess earnings provisions in order to eliminate the tax and earnings penalties imposed on the wage income of individuals who have attained retirement age.

titles.title: Fair Tax Relief for Working Older Americans
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the penalty imposed on wage income earned by individuals who have attained retirement age.
